page.title: 04MOUNTFORD MANOR SC.E SWINDON
page.content: The school is a two storey{flat-roofed building with 12 class rooms.It celebrated its{25th anniversary}in 1984. The headmaster is Mr. Hannath. Although built for many more pupils, the schools present roll of about 150 reflects the current trend of{falling} {numbers}of pupils. The children are aged between 7 and 11 years and come from the surrounding housing estate which is council owned and rented by the tenants. There is an extensive playing field and an asphalt playground with a climbing apparatus. There is a class catering for the {special needs}of 6 partial hearing children.
